name: Overlooking View
description: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.

name: The Remains of the Gale
description: Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

name: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."
description: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.

name: Unswerving
description: Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.

name: Initiating Warp Drive!
description: Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.

name: Beloved of the Anemo Archon
description: Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.

name: The Best Sword in the Cemetery
description: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.

name: Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula
description: Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.

name: Cecilia Garden
description: Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.

name: Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula
description: Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

name: "If you put your heart into it..."
description: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.

name: "...Anyone can be a gourmet."
description: Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.

name: Boared to Death
description: Be defeated by a wild boar.

name: Golden Gliding License
description: Glide a long, long distance in one go.

name: It's the Same As Having Wings
description: Glide continuously for over 80s.

name: Quick As Lightning
description: Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

name: Friends the World Over
description: Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.

name: Megastar in Mondstadt
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.

name: Legend in Liyue
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete %var% Bounties.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete %var% Requests.

name: QUEST FAILED
description: Lost track of a Bounty target.

name: The Bleak Midwinter
description: Succumb to Sheer Cold...

name: Priest, Princess, and Scribe
description: Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.

name: Prodigal Son's Return
description: Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.

name: Snow-Stored History
description: Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.

name: Glacial Steel
description: Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.

name: Futile Endeavor
description: Discover the remains of many ruin machines.

name: Untellable Tale
description: Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.

name: Towering Achievement
description: Reach the summit of Dragonspine.

name: Winter Wonderland
description: Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.

name: The Hunter Becomes the Hunted
description: Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.

name: Chill Out!
description: Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.

name: Glutton for Goulash
description: Learn to make Goulash.

name: Wrath of the Gods
description: Get struck by lightning.

name: Sky High
description: Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.

name: Juggernaut
description: Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

name: The PRISM Program
description: Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
description: Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

name: "...Not indicative of final product"
description: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

name: The Bigger They Are...
description: Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.

name: Through Pass
description: Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.

name: Dolorous Stroke
description: Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.

name: Hilichurl Champion
description: Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

name: Bon App√©tit
description: Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over %var%,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Fantastic Four
description: Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

name: "Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"
description: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: "That Was Blooming Hot"
description: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: Outlander Vs. Outlander
description: Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.

name: The End of the Beginning
description: Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

name: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
description: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

name: For a Tomorrow Without Tears
description: Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

name: Song of the Dragon and Freedom
description: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."

name: Let the Wind Lead
description: Obtain the power of Anemo.

name: ...Or a New Storm?
description: Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.

name: Knighthood Excellence
description: Become an Honorary Knight of Favonius.

name: Knights and their Knotty Issues
description: Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.

name: Winds Change Their Course
description: Be rescued by Dvalin.

name: Of the Land Amidst Monoliths
description: Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"

name: Farewell, Archaic Lord
description: Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."

name: Outlandish Behavior
description: Be rescued by an outsider at the "tourist spot that locals don't go to."

name: Silly-Billy Churlish Ghoul
description: Agree to play with Dusky Ming.

name: That Smells Divine
description: Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.

name: It's Bigger on the Inside
description: Clean Madame Ping's teapot.

name: Ticked, Tacked, and Towed
description: Commission others to finish your work, unfettered by such things as Mora.

name: Respecting Cultural Heritage
description: You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.

name: The Long Goodbye
description: Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.

name: Icing on the Slime
description: Create a box of lovely, jubbly Sugar-Frosted Slimes.

name: Sky's the Limit
description: Reach Liyue's "mansion in the sky".

name: Lily Loves Music
description: Sing a song of Mondstadt to the Glaze Lilies...

name: I'll Let You Off... This Time
description: Defeat Childe.

name: Derailed
description: Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.

name: Final Farewell
description: Take part in the Rite of Parting.

name: A New Star Approaches
description: Complete "A New Star Approaches".

name: Pirates! Argh!
description: Play a game of pirates with Little Lulu, Little Fei, and Little Meng.

name: A Nourishing Friendship
description: Complete "Fishing Jiangxue" and "Yanxiao's Dilemma."

name: Love Is All Around
description: In "Good Sign," help Zhihua find 5 signs that romance is coming his way.

name: For the Love of Godwin
description: Finish "Whispers in the Wind" 5 times.

name: Level Up
description: Help Huai'an repair Wangshu Inn's broken bridge.

name: Beginner's Luck
description: Select the highest-value jade on your first try.

name: Taking Responsibility for Your Actions
description: Apologize to Timmie.

name: Making Do
description: Only bring materials for a training dummy to Herman.

name: "Dear Daddy..."
description: Hear Timmie's story.

name: Marvelous Medicine
description: Cure Anna's illness.

name: In the Name of Favonius
description: Witness Jilliana's tale.

name: Scholarly Pretensions
description: Complete "The Lost Relic" and "A Little Raid."

name: Poet Vs. Paycheck
description: Complete "So-called Work" and receive Linling's poetry anthology.

name: All's Well That Ends Well
description: Complete the quest "For Old Time's Sake."

name: This Novel Is Amazing!
description: Steal a peek at Chang the Ninth's draft manuscript.

name: Open to Interpretation
description: Ruin 4 signs of an imminent romance.

name: Get Your Own Emergency Food!
description: Consume the food during "Food Delivery"...?

name: Nothing to Lose But Time
description: Unlock the secrets of two sundials.

name: Interview with a Bygone God
description: Hear the story of a bygone deity.

name: Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi
description: Learn about the tale of the Chi.

name: Scourge of the Battlefield
description: Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

name: Shadow Over Luhua Pool
description: Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.

name: Ready Player Zero
description: Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

name: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, For That Is Where the Home is Made
description: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.

name: Transmutation Nuclide
description: Use the Parametric Transformer to complete one material transmutation.

name: Penalty
description: There are places where one cannot simply dig Pyro Slimes out of the ground...

name: Force Field Erosion
description: Destroy the Electro Hypostasis' barrier.

name: "...Lizard-Spock"
description: Have one character get hit by all three parts of the rock-paper-scissors attack consecutively.

name: A House Ill-Founded
description: Cause the same Geo Hypostasis to fall three times by destroying the Basalt Column that it is on.

name: None Stand Secure
description: Force the Geo Hypostasis into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.

name: Back With The Wind
description: Absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the Anemo Hypostasis in a single battle.

name: Core Meltdown
description: Destroy the Blazing Seed created by a Pyro Regisvine.

name: Knockout
description: Destroy a Cryo Regisvine's corolla weak point while it is performing its rotary spray attack.

name: "...Till Debt Do Us Part"
description: Defeat a Fatui Agent while they are in their stealth mode.

name: "Melting... Away..."
description: Defeat a Cryo Cicin Mage while all her Cryo Cicins are currently active.

name: And You Call Yourself One of the Four Winds
description: Defeat an Anemoboxer Vanguard after having triggered all of their Elemental Absorptions.

name: Touch and Go
description: Use a shield to counter a Geovishap's charging attack.

name: Deflection!
description: Use a shield to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack.

name: You Can Have Those Back!
description: Use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.

name: Gears of Destiny
description: Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".

name: ...You could hear Paimon all along, couldn't you?
description: Even Paimon gets tired sometimes.

name: The Bandit, the Lunatic, and the Pitch-Black Enigma
description: Uncover the Grand Thief's fate.

name: Where Fate Comes to a Crossroads
description: Escape the eerie ruins.

name: Sneering at the Power of the Gods
description: Learn of the "Loom of Fate"...

name: Silence, You Raving Lunatic
description: Defeat the Abyss Herald.

name: We Will Be Reunited
description: Complete "We Will Be Reunited."
